definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The Vista is equipped with large stabilizers & control surfaces for excellent handling and low speed controllability (elevator & stabilizer span is carefully matched to wing span).
sentences.chinese: 大跨度，高展弦比机翼提供优异攀登性能。

sentences.english: The high vault and high aspect ratio for an intermediate is the base of this concept.
sentences.chinese: 高伞拱和高展弦比是本款伞设计理念的基本。

sentences.english: Approaches to calculate the response to continuous and discrete gust for hacw were presented.
sentences.chinese: 为此建立了大展弦比机翼突风响应的分析方法。

sentences.english: Effects of the aspect ratio and angle of attack are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了展弦比和攻角的影响。

pinyin: wo1 lun2 pen1 qi4 fa1 dong4 ji1
